items.name: BLOCK
desc: contents are justified to the cell width.

items.name: CENTER
desc: contents are aligned to the vertical middle of the cell.

items.name: LEFT
desc: contents are aligned to the left edge of the cell.

items.name: REPEAT
desc: contents are repeated to fill the cell.

items.name: RIGHT
desc: contents are aligned to the right edge of the cell.

items.name: STANDARD
desc: default alignment is used (left for numbers, right for text).
contents are printed from left to right.
